snippet: Hunter Biden, the younger son of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., is said to have failed a drug test for using cocaine and was discharged this year from the Navy Reserve.
abstract: Hunter Biden, younger son of Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr, is said to have failed a drug test for using cocaine and was discharged in 2014 from the Navy Reserve.
lead_paragraph: Hunter Biden, the younger son of Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., is said to have failed a drug test for using cocaine and was discharged this year from the Navy Reserve.
